commands: Start-Process powershell -ArgumentList "-NoExit", "-Command", "git --version; git clone https://github.com/ed-donner/agents.git; cd agents; ls; uv.exe sync" -Wait -WorkingDirectory "C:\Users\Administrator"
if ($?) { Write-Host "All installations, cloning, and sync completed successfully." } else { Write-Host "There were errors during installation, cloning, or sync." }
